text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump You forgot to list the number of (unnecessary) death and the still growing number of infections. All  Trump had to do was to learn from mistakes already made in China, Italy and Spain..... Instead of calling it a HOAX and do nothing for 3 crucial weeks!#COVID19
#DonaldTrump
